info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: api.app.eva.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 236 Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Date: Sun, 31 Jul 2022 13:24:40 GMT Location: https://eva.beta.gouv.fr/pro Server: Apache Via: 1.1 alproxy 301 Moved Permanently

Moved Permanently

The document has moved here.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: api.app.eva.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://api.app.eva.beta.gouv.fr/'
